default_message: What do you want to do?
give_request: Who do you want to give the item to?
give_response: Provide the name of the item you want to give or select it from the given list.
add_response: Provide the name of the item you want to add or select it from the given list.
item_remove_select: Please select the item you want to remove. If the selected item's quantity is more than one, it will be decreased by one.
item_delete_request: Please provide the name of the item you want to remove from the database. Only exact matches are accepted.
item_edit_request: Please provide the name of the item you want to edit from the database. Only exact matches are accepted.
item_register_request:
Please provide the new item's data in this form:
name
url
bulk
"description"

Description can be multiline, please respect the order. Every field is optional, name and bulk are mandatory.
edit_selection: What do you want to edit?
list_detail_selection: Select an item from your inventory.
money_transaction_request: How many copper coins? Negative number for paying.
custom_item_info_request: Provide bulk (mandatory) and category (optional) separated by commas.
add_item_request: Which item do you want to add?
item_not_found: Error, this item does not exist.
no_bulk_name: Error. Name and bulk are mandatory.
broadcast_message_content_req: What do you want to send?
